Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: Grimaldi's
Description: Best pizza on the face of the planet, period.

Name: Hollywood
Description: Probably the coolest-looking and best sounding amphitheater I've had the pleasure to experience.

Name: Las Cruces
Description: My parents are retiring here -- doesn't get better if you like quiet, wide open desert, or stars.

Name: Boulder
Description: Beautiful, lively town with a large state university against the backdrop of the Colorado Rockies.

Name: Cabarete
Description: Tropical climate and windy beaches make this a destination for kite-surfing and great local coffee.
